title: Saturday Night Live review: Phoebe Waller-Bridge left even Taylor Swift star-struck
text:
We can try to play it cool, but it is undeniably exciting when British talent makes it big in the US. We’ve never even met the woman, but we can’t help but feel a huge sense of pride that Phoebe Waller-Bridge is now officially world-famous, so much so that the Fleabag star was invited to host the entertainment behemoth that is Saturday Night Live this weekend.

With Taylor Swift appearing on the same night as the musical guest, it was basically a modern pop culture dream: two talented megastars, both infamous for how perfectly they’ve captured modern romance, albeit in dramatically different ways. It’s the very sort of thing that can break the internet, you know.

The show began with a monologue...
description: We can try to play it cool, but it is undeniably exciting when British talent makes it big in the US.
